name: The Take (itch) (Philip Newsham)
description:
The take is based on Season 10, Episode 4 of It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia: Charlie Work!

In this episode the majority of the action is designed to look like it's being filmed in one take (like Birdman). As a big fan of long single take shots I wondered how that might be done for a video game (where most games do take place with one continuous camera shot!), the result is much shorter than I'd like!

There's a lot more that I could have done to neaten this game up (and I have just read the disclaimer that submissions will be recieved after the deadline!) but I am happy enough with it as it stands to publish it, more for my own sake than as a potential contestant!
